item.title: Cookie sync in programmatic advertising
item.description: Cookie is a browser mechanism to store small piece of information in client’s browser. Now days, cookie is widely used in: - Sign in. Store session in cookie for server side authentication. - User preference. It stores user preference and load them when open the site which makes the UI user friendly. - eCommerce. Remember the good in your shopping cart. - Tracking behavior. It records the user behavior for better targeting.
